ai-tha-ap149:1.2_0: you fall under the eye’s control.
ai-tha-ap149:1.4_0: the sword of its own characteristic:
ai-tha-ap149:2.2_0: having made them agree on the road,
ai-tha-ap149:2.3_0: after worshipping the Teacher, worshipping him,
ai-tha-ap149:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap149:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap149:3.4_0: as a gift is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap149:4.3_0: Suppabuddha the Buddha is not good.
ai-tha-ap149:4.4_0: there’s no sorrow in his ear.
ai-tha-ap149:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable State.
